quotes.speaker: Capt. Jean-Luc Picard
quotes.text: “There is a way out of every box, a solution to every puzzle; it's just a matter of finding it.”
quotes.teaseText: Captain Picard loves boxes and puzzles. Here's how much.

quotes.speaker: Lt. Cmdr. Data
quotes.text: “Open sesame! You could say I have a magnetic personality. Humor! I love it.”
quotes.teaseText: You wouldn't think Data is funny. But he is.

quotes.speaker: Cmdr. William T. Riker
quotes.text: “The game's not big enough unless it scares you a little.”
quotes.teaseText: Riker is a risk-taker. But how much of one?
